verses.roman:
rāmānanda, sārvabhauma, sabāra agrete
haridāsera guṇa prabhu lāgilā kahite

synonyms: rāmānanda—Rāmānanda Rāya; sārvabhauma—Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; sabāra—of all; agrete—in front; haridāsera—of Haridāsa Ṭhākura; guṇa—attributes; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; lāgilā kahite—began to describe.
translation: In front of all the great devotees like Rāmānanda Rāya and Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu began to describe the holy attributes of Haridāsa Ṭhākura.
